title: Lorestan Landscapes
content: In the Lorestan province area, particularly the south and west parts, rare geological landscapes can be seen: The striking layerings of diverse formations, mountains, summits, and glaciers. The adjacency of these natural fronts with the geological landscapes has put Lurestan among the most spectacular provinces in the country for geotourism.

gallery.caption: GL20-1 :The rare landscape of Naft anticline, west of Kooh Dasht
